description: Upload an image for livestream use case

common_parameters.name: partner_id
common_parameters.description: Permanent unique identifier is successful. Required for all requests

common_parameters.name: timestamp
common_parameters.description: Unix time stamp for API validity, needs to identify your permission to call APIs. Expires in 5 minutes

common_parameters.name: sign
common_parameters.description: Signature generated to indicate your different API permission. partner_key sig HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm generated string

response_parameters.name: code
response_parameters.description: Indicates error type if not zero. Empty if no error happened

response_parameters.name: message
response_parameters.description: Indicates error status if not zero. Empty if no error happened

response_parameters.name: request_id
response_parameters.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking

notes: This appears to be an API for uploading images in a livestream context. The documentation includes complete request/response parameters, error codes, and authentication requirements via partner_id, timestamp and sign parameters.
